name: BridgingButler

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bridging butler
Developer Terms of Use
des: Looking after aging loved ones as their needs change can be difficult, particularly if they want to maintain an active and independent lifestyle. That’s why we’ve harnessed the power of technology to create a solution that integrates seamlessly into their lives.
